investmentIntro.title: Invest Bitcoin in 3 Steps
investmentIntro.step1.title: Buy & Store Bitcoin
investmentIntro.step1.content: You can now buy bitcoin right on crypto exchange using fiat currency. Then you can connect your wallet here to earn incredible yeilds.

investmentIntro.step2.content: Deposit to Bitcoin vault to grow your assets.
investmentIntro.step3.title: Earn Trustuble Yields
investmentIntro.step3.content: Withdraw your asset and earn bitcoin yields anytime, anywhere. Investment flexibility is the key to maximize your wealth and to make it sustainable.
